page.title: 08ARMED FORCES
page.content: THE ONLY MILITARY PRESENCE IN OUR AREA IS THE RAF. HOWEVER, IT IS A VERY IMPORTANT PART OF THE LIFE IN OUR AREA BECAUSE THE RAF AIR STATION AT NEARBY ODIHAM IN FACT COVERS MUCH OF OUR BLOCK. IT IS A MAJOR HELICOPTER BASE AND EVERY DAY WE CAN SEE AND HEAR THE HELICOPTERS TRAINING, USUALLY FLYING LOW ACROSS THE AREA CARRYING VERY LARGE LOADS IN NETS UNDERNEATH. THE BASE HAS BEEN THERE SINCE ABOUT 1930 SO MOST PEOPLE HAVE BECOME USED TO THE NOISE AND DONT MIND IT. ALSO, THE BASE DOES EMPLOY SOME LOCAL PEOPLE THOUGH NOT VERY MANY. THE BASE BECAME VERY IMPORTANT IN 1982 BECAUSE IT WAS FROM THERE THAT MANY OF THE LARGE CHINOOK HELICPTERS THAT WERE USED IN THE FALKLANDS WAR ORIGINATED.
